channel.title: San Juan County|New Mexico|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in San Juan County|New Mexico|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: US-550 North - Leaving New Mexico/Welcome To Colorado
item.description: Leaving New Mexico and Entering Colorado on US-550 North. Many of the exits to New Mexico have the Leaving New Mexico - Hasta La Vista sign. The Welcome To Colorful Colorado is a standard welcome sign. Taken at the New Mexico - Colorado State Line on US-550 north.

item.title: US-550 North at NM-173
item.description: US-550 north at NM-173 west to Navajo Lake State Park.

item.title: US-550 North Approaching NM-173
item.description: US-550 north approaching NM-173. Turn right on NM-173 for the Aztec Tiger Sports Complex.

item.title: US-550 North at NM-516
item.description: US-550 north at NM-516 in Aztec. Turn right to continue north on US-550.

item.title: US-550 North at NM-57
item.description: US-550 north at NM-57. While many maps appear to show NM-57 as connecting US-550 to Chaco Canyon from the north, NM-57 does not provide access to Chaco Canyon.

item.title: US-550 North - Chaco Canyon Jct.
item.description: US-550 north at turn off to Chaco Culture National Historic Park.

item.title: US-550 North - San Juan County Line
item.description: San Juan County Line on US-550 north.

item.title: US-491 South at US-64
item.description: US-491 south at US-64. US-491 south joins US-64 through Shiprock.

item.title: US-491 South Approaching US-64
item.description: US-491 south approaching US-64. Turn right for US-64 West/US-491 south; left for US-64 east.

item.title: US-491 South - Welcome To New Mexico
item.description: Welcome To New Mexico - Land of Enchantment on US-491 south. Taken at the Colorado - New Mexico state line.

item.title: US-64 East at US-550 South
item.description: US-64 east at US-550 South. US-550 joins US-64 east through Bloomfield. Turn south on US-550 for Cuba and Albuquerque; continue ahead on US-64 East/US-550 North for Aztec.

item.title: US-64 West/US-550 South at US-550 South
item.description: US-64 West/US-550 South at US-550 South. Turn left on US-550 south for Albuquerque. Continue ahead for US-64 west to Farmington.

item.title: US-64 West at US-550
item.description: US-64 west at US-550. US-550 south joins US-64 west through Bloomfield. Turn north on US-550 for Durango (Colorado). Continue ahead on US-64/US-550 for Albuquerque.

item.title: US-64 West Approaching US-550
item.description: US-64 west approaching US-550. Use US-550 north for Aztec. Continue ahead for US-64 West/US-550 South to Farmington.

item.title: US-64 West Approaching US-550
item.description: US-64 west approaching US-550. US-550 joins US-64 through Bloomfield.

item.title: NM-575 South Approaching US-64
item.description: NM-575 south approaching US-64

item.title: NM-575 North
item.description: NM-575 north near the community of Blanco.

item.title: NM-575 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on NM-575 north to Aztec.

item.title: NM-575 - Inclement Weather Warning
item.description: NM-575 may be impassable in inclement weather, notice on NM-575 north. The author attempted to drive NM-575 north from Blanco to Aztec a few days after rains in the fall and was turned back by a section of deep mud.

item.title: US-64 East Approaching NM-575
item.description: US-64 East approaching NM-575 near the community of Blanco.

item.title: US-64 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-64 east to Blanco, Dulce, and Chama.

item.title: US-64 East/US-550 North at US-550 North
item.description: US-64 East/US-550 North at US-550 North. Use US-550 north for Aztec; continue east on US-64 for Blanco.

item.title: US-64 East/US-550 North Approaching US-550 North
item.description: US-64 East/US-550 North approaching US-550 north in Bloomfield.

item.title: US-64 East/US-550 North
item.description: US-64 East/US-550 North in Bloomfield.

item.title: US-550 North at US-64
item.description: US-550 north at US-64. Turn right for US-550 North/US-64 East for Aztec and Blanco. Turn left for US-64 West to Farmington.

item.title: US-550 South
item.description: US-550 south in Bloomfield.

item.title: US-64 East at US-550
item.description: US-64 east at US-550. Turn right for US-550 south; continue ahead for US-64 East/US-550 North. US-550 joins US-64 through Bloomfield.

item.title: NM-170 South
item.description: South NM-170, just south of NM-574.

item.title: NM-170 North at NM-574 East
item.description: NM-170 north at NM-574 east.

item.title: NM-170 North Approaching NM-574
item.description: NM-170 north approaching NM-574 east.

item.title: US-64 West at NM-170
item.description: US-64 West at NM-170 north to La Plata and Hesperus (CO).

item.title: US-64 West Approaching NM-170
item.description: US-64 West approaching NM-170 North.

item.title: Bus. US-64 West at US-64/To NM-371
item.description: Bus. US-64 west at US-64. Turn east on US-64 for NM-371.

item.title: Bus. US-64 West - Farmington
item.description: Bus. US-64 West.

item.title: US-64 West - Farmingon Bypass
item.description: US-64 West at Bus. US-64 West. Use Bus. US-64 west for Downtown Farmington.

item.title: US-64 West - To NM-371
item.description: To NM-371 on US-64 West.

item.title: NM-516 South Approaching US-64
item.description: NM-516 south approaching US-64. Use US-64 east for Bloomfield and Albuquerque. Use US-64 west for Shiprock.

item.title: NM-516 South at Browning Parkway
item.description: NM-516 south (Main St.) at Browning Parkway. Turn left to continue on NM-516 for Bloomfield and Albuquerque. Continue on Main St.for Shiprock.

item.title: US-64 West at NM-371
item.description: US-64 West at NM-371 South.

item.title: US-64 West Approaching NM-371
item.description: US-64 West approaching NM-371 South to Crownpoint and I-40.

item.title: US-64 East - Farmington Bypass
item.description: US-64 East at Bus US-64. Use Bus. US-64 for Farmington. Use US-64 for the Truck Bypass.

item.title: US-64 East at NM-170
item.description: US-64 east at NM-170 north to La Plata and Hesperus (CO).

item.title: US-64 East/US-491 North Approaching US-491 Jct.
item.description: US-64 East/US-491 north at split. Use US-491 north for Cortez (CO). Use US-64 east for Farmington.

item.title: US-64 East/US-491 at Split
item.description: US-64 East/US-491 north at split. Turn left for US-491 north.

item.title: US-64 East at US-491
item.description: US-64 east at US-491. Use US-491 south for Gallup. US-491 north joins US-64 through Shiprock.

item.title: US-64 East Approaching US-491
item.description: US-64 east approaching US-491.

item.title: End NM-597 at US-160
item.description: End NM-597 south at US-160.

item.title: NM-597 - Four Corners Access Road
item.description: NM-597 at Four Corners

item.title: NM-597 - Four Corners
item.description: NM-597 just north of US-160. NM-597 is a short state route connecting US-160 with the Four Corners monument.

item.title: NM-597 - Welcome To New Mexico
item.description: Welcome to New Mexico on NM-597, at US-160.

item.title: US-160 East at NM-597
item.description: US-160 east approaching NM-597 at Four Corners.

item.title: NM-511 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on NM-511 south at the NM-CO line.

item.title: NM-516 North - Farmington
item.description: NM-516 north in Farmington

item.title: NM-516 North at NM-574
item.description: NM-516 north at NM-574 in Aztec.

item.title: NM-597 at Four Corners
item.description: NM-597 at Four Corners

item.title: US-160 West at NM-597
item.description: US-160 west at NM-597 junction at Four Corners, just west of the Colorado line.

item.title: US-64 East at MN-516 North
item.description: US-64 east at NM-516 north (former US-550) junction in Farmington.

item.title: US-64 East at NM-170
item.description: US-64 east approaching NM-170 in Farmington.

item.title: US-64 East at NM-170
item.description: US-64 east at NM-170 north to LaPlata. Taken in Farmington.

item.title: US-64 east at US-491 North
item.description: US-64 east at US-491 junction north in Shiprock.

item.title: US-64 East at US-491 North
item.description: US-64 east at US-491 north to Cortez. Taken in Shiprock.

item.title: US-64 East at US-64 Truck Bypass
item.description: US-64 east Farmington Truck Bypass Junction
